name: DeflectPhoneCallsToMessenger
description:
Deflect phone calls to Intercom Messenger via SMS link.

Use this tool to send an SMS with a link to the Intercom Messenger, redirecting phone calls to the Messenger. If custom attributes are provided, they will be added to the user or lead's custom data.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options are: '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing the phone number and optional custom attributes for the user or lead. The phone number must be in E.164 format.

phone.description: Phone number in E.164 format, that will receive the SMS to continue the conversation in the Messenger.
